quests.shortDescription: To defeat my father, we will need to recruit Artemis. For her, everything is about the hunt. - Aphrodite

quests.name: Decipher the third Olympian Edict
quests.description: Decipher the third Olympian Edict
quests.shortDescription: I assume this Edict wasn't intended for the banana. Let's take a look. - The Oracle

quests.name: Eliminate players from a combined distance
quests.description: Eliminate players from a combined distance
quests.shortDescription: You've got Artemis' attention. It is time to finish the hunt. - Aphrodite

quests.name: Receive gifts from Artemis then speak with her
quests.description: Receive gifts from Artemis then speak with her
quests.shortDescription: I heard you've been wanting to speak with me, little mouse. - Artemis

quests.name: Decipher the final Olympian Edict
quests.description: Decipher the final Olympian Edict
quests.shortDescription: Zeus is blinded by his rage. All he can see is mortal hubris. - The Oracle

quests.name: Use a Scrying Pool to speak with Cerberus
quests.description: Use a Scrying Pool to speak with Cerberus
quests.shortDescription: My other heads are feeling... bite-y these days. Come to a Scrying Pool so we can talk! - Cerberus

quests.name: Eliminate anything to see if they took the Artifact
quests.description: Eliminate anything to see if they took the Artifact
quests.shortDescription: Anyone could have taken it. Search EVERYONE!! BARK BARK BARK! - Cerberus

quests.name: Did I leave it under the windmill with a view of the Styx?...
quests.description: Did I leave it under the windmill with a view of the Styx?...
quests.shortDescription: Not that one, the Other one! - Cerberus

quests.name: Dig up the Artifact by The Other Windmill
quests.description: Dig up the Artifact by The Other Windmill
quests.shortDescription: Yeah! Yeah! Yeah! This must be it! - Cerberus

quests.name: Maybe on a grassy island in the center of everything?...
quests.description: Maybe on a grassy island in the center of everything?...
quests.shortDescription: I wouldn't forget it in such an obvious place... would I? - Cerberus

quests.name: Dig up the Artifact on the island
quests.description: Dig up the Artifact on the island
quests.shortDescription: I bet it's my Artifact!! - Cerberus

quests.name: I left it near the snow, where people bury yummy bones too...
quests.description: I left it near the snow, where people bury yummy bones too...
quests.shortDescription: This is my favorite spot on the whole Island. The Artifact's definitely here. - Cerberus

quests.name: Dig up the Artifact by The Cemetery
quests.description: Dig up the Artifact by The Cemetery
quests.shortDescription: That sweet scent! Id know it anywhere! - Cerberus

quests.name: Optional Stage - 4 of 9 DEFEAT ARES AND ZEUS! THEY TOOK THE ARTIFACT!
quests.description: Optional Stage - 4 of 9 DEFEAT ARES AND ZEUS! THEY TOOK THE ARTIFACT!
quests.shortDescription: THEY TOOK THE ARTIFACT. ELIMINATE THEM. I KNOW THEY HAVE IT. - Cerberus other heads

quests.name: Use a Scrying Pool to speak with Hades
quests.description: Use a Scrying Pool to speak with Hades
quests.shortDescription: I'm such a bad dog for losing the Artifact. Hades is going to be so mad at me. - Cerberus

quests.name: Defeat Cerberus to gain his tracking abilities
quests.description: Defeat Cerberus to gain his tracking abilities
quests.shortDescription: You'll have to get my other heads to submit before they'll agree to help. - Cerberus

quests.name: Follow the scent of and collect the Artifact
quests.description: Follow the scent of and collect the Artifact
quests.shortDescription: I know I was wrong before but this is ABSOLUTELY the right way! - Cerberus

quests.name: Return the Artifact to Cerberus Dog House
quests.description: Return the Artifact to Cerberus Dog House
quests.shortDescription: Please leave it in my safe place for now. Ill retrieve it when I'm off the clock. - Cerberus

quests.name: Use a Scrying Pool to speak with The Oracle
quests.description: Use a Scrying Pool to speak with The Oracle
quests.shortDescription: Hero. It is time for us to speak. - The Oracle

quests.name: Speak with Medusa after all other snapshots are completed
quests.description: Speak with Medusa after all other snapshots are completed
quests.shortDescription: It seems as though you and I have a shared purpose. We should speak. - Medusa

quests.name: Destroy vases to collect the Golden Fleece statues
quests.description: Destroy vases to collect the Golden Fleece statues
quests.shortDescription: I made these statuettes from the mythical Golden Fleece, and Zeus just... leaves them around. - Medusa

quests.name: Find and retrieve Medusa's Broken Harpe Sword
quests.description: Find and retrieve Medusa's Broken Harpe Sword
quests.shortDescription: This sword is precious to me. It is the sword Perseus wielded when he spared my life. - Medusa

quests.name: Collect a Crackling Hourglass
quests.description: Collect a Crackling Hourglass
quests.shortDescription: I do not recognize this, but... it looks like my craftsmanship. Bring it to me. - Medusa.

quests.name: Deliver the artifacts to Medusa
quests.description: Deliver the artifacts to Medusa
quests.shortDescription: Bring the artifacts to me. I need to figure out what Zeus was using them for. - Medusa

quests.description: Complete stages from quest 2 to advance

quests.description: Use a Scrying Pool to speak with The Oracle

quests.name: Stage 1 of 14 - Use a Scrying Pool to speak with The Oracle
quests.description: Stage 1 of 14 - Use a Scrying Pool to speak with The Oracle
quests.shortDescription: Come closer, mortal... - The Oracle

quests.name: Stage 2 of 14 - Overcome the Test of Agility at Restored Reels
quests.description: Stage 2 of 14 - Overcome the Test of Agility at Restored Reels
quests.shortDescription: You will need to move quickly and decisively to survive. - The Oracle

quests.name: Stage 3 of 14 - Overcome the Test of Strength at Lavish Lair or Fencing Fields
quests.description: Stage 3 of 14 - Overcome the Test of Strength at Lavish Lair or Fencing Fields
quests.shortDescription: A true hero embodies mighty strength. - The Oracle

quests.name: Stage 4 of 14 - Overcome the Test of Wisdom at a Scrying Pool

quests.shortDescription: It takes more than brawn to save mortalkind. - The Oracle

quests.name: Stage 5 of 14 - Send Hades a message by eliminating opponents
quests.description: Stage 5 of 14 - Send Hades a message by eliminating opponents
quests.shortDescription: Show me your skill in battle. - The Oracle

quests.name: Stage 6 of 14 - Use a Scrying Pool to speak with Hades
quests.description: Stage 6 of 14 - Use a Scrying Pool to speak with Hades
quests.shortDescription: So you're the hero my wayward shades have been talking about... - Hades

quests.name: Stage 7 of 14 - Collect a Gatekeeper Shotgun then visit Grim Gate
quests.description: Stage 7 of 14 - Collect a Gatekeeper Shotgun then visit Grim Gate
quests.shortDescription: Prepare to face the fiercest hound in the Underworld! - Hades

quests.name: Stage 8 of 14 - Damage Cerberus to assert your dominance
quests.description: Stage 8 of 14 - Damage Cerberus to assert your dominance
quests.shortDescription: Tell me, mortal. Have you ever been chewed on by three heads before? - Hades

quests.name: Stage 9 of 14 - Defeat a Character in a duel or eliminate a god
quests.description: Stage 9 of 14 - Defeat a Character in a duel or eliminate a god
quests.shortDescription: If you are to save mortalkind, you must train your combat skills at every opportunity. - The Oracle

quests.name: Stage 10 of 14 - Use a Scrying Pool to speak with Ares
quests.description: Stage 10 of 14 - Use a Scrying Pool to speak with Ares
quests.shortDescription: HA! A CHALLENGER!! - Ares

quests.name: Stage 11 of 14 - Collect a Warforged Assault Rifle then visit Pantheon Path
quests.description: Stage 11 of 14 - Collect a Warforged Assault Rifle then visit Pantheon Path
quests.shortDescription: HONORABLE COMBAT STARTS WITH A THOUGHTFUL GIFT. - Ares

quests.name: Stage 12 of 14 - Damage Ares to bring war to the gods
quests.description: Stage 12 of 14 - Damage Ares to bring war to the gods
quests.shortDescription: YOU WILL NEVER DEFEAT ME! - Ares

quests.name: Stage 13 of 14 - Assist in collecting an Aspect of the Gods
quests.description: Stage 13 of 14 - Assist in collecting an Aspect of the Gods
quests.shortDescription: YOU FIGHT WELL... BUT WELL ENOUGH TO COLLECT A MEDALLION?! HA! - Ares

quests.name: Stage 14 of 14 - Use a Scrying Pool to speak with The Oracle
quests.description: Stage 14 of 14 - Use a Scrying Pool to speak with The Oracle
quests.shortDescription: Your fate becomes clearer to me. Let us discuss it. - The Oracle
